Text: EnronOnline DRAFT OF NEWS ORDER FORM Cc todays telephone conference attached for your review is a draft Order Form for the news component of the EnronOnlinecom transaction The Order Form for the data component will follow later this evening See attached file EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm doc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm doc

EnronOnline DRAFT OF DATA ORDER FORM Cc earlier email attached for your review is a draft Order Form for the data component of the EnronOnlinecom transaction Please note that my business principals have not reviewed either Order Form for completeness or accuracy and therefore the Order Forms are subject to comment by them See attached file EnronInvestorDataOrderForm doc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Forwarded by Stanford LinNYCUSReuters on PM From Stanford Lin on PM To cc Lynne EUTERS James EUTERS Subject EnronOnline DRAFT OF NEWS ORDER FORM Internal Use Only As per todays telephone conference attached for your review is a draft Order Form for the news component of the EnronOnlinecom transaction The Order Form for the data component will follow later this evening See attached file EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm doc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorDataOrderForm doc EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm doc

EnronOnline REVISED TERMS CONDITIONS Cc Working Group Attached is a revised version of the Terms Conditions which incorporates changes discussed today Please note the following Section In the interest of time I took a shot at adding language here regarding access to Reuters Content by Reuters competitors I am open to your comments and suggestions on this language Section I have reviewed the Order Forms and will agree to your proposal to take out the language solely for the purpose of accessing the Reuters Content Section After considerable internal debate we will take out subsection iv provided that we can achieve some consensus on the remaining legal issues Addendum Section We understand that you are taking news in realtime via a datafeed and have approved your redistribution of such news in real time I also understand that your are taking market data via an API and that such data is sent to you in delayed form via the API Therefore Section does not apply to Enron at this time The purpose of Section is to cover a situation in which Enron were to migrate from the API to an actual datafeed product or take a market data datafeed in addition to the API We have had clients in the past who desired to upgrade their Internet site and take market data via a Reuters Datafeed in lieu of or in conjunction with the API In such event the client simply completed a new Order Form and we did not have to renegotiate the Terms Conditions With that in mind we would like to retain Section in the Terms Conditions I have tried to insert additional wording to make clear it will not impact the deal currently under negotiation See attached file EnronInvestorTC reviseddot Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Forwarded by Stanford LinNYCUSReuters on PM From Stanford Lin on PM To cc Lynne EUTERS James EUTERS Shawn EUTERS Subject EnronOnline DRAFT OF DATA ORDER FORM Internal Use Only Following my earlier email attached for your review is a draft Order Form for the data component of the EnronOnlinecom transaction Please note that my business principals have not reviewed either Order Form for completeness or accuracy and therefore the Order Forms are subject to comment by them See attached file EnronInvestorDataOrderForm doc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Forwarded by Stanford LinNYCUSReuters on PM From Stanford Lin on PM To cc Lynne EUTERS James EUTERS Subject EnronOnline DRAFT OF NEWS ORDER FORM Internal Use Only As per todays telephone conference attached for your review is a draft Order Form for the news component of the EnronOnlinecom transaction The Order Form for the data component will follow later this evening See attached file EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm doc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorTC reviseddot EnronInvestorDataOrderForm doc EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm doc

EnronOnlinecomREVISED ORDER FORMS Cc revised Order Forms based on comments I received today from Lynne Carithers Accepted changes to the Order Forms are as follows The portals enroncreditcom and enrondirectfinancecom have been added to the Order Forms Under Reuters Services for Reuters Global Focus News Gallery language which states that new reports will be made available as new countries are added to the Reuters Domestic News Pool has been added In the Fee Schedule for both Order Forms reporting has been changed from business days to days Changes that were not accepted Proposal to change Enron Corporation to Enron Corporation Affiliates The reason for this is that Reuters needs to look to one entity for all fees reporting and enforcement for the agreement The fact that Enrons affiliates will contribute content to a site or that the users of the sites are customers of Enrons affiliates poses no problem under the agreement but the agreement makes clear that the Reuters newsdata will be delivered to only one entity Enron Corporation and that Enron Corporation will be the entity that republishes the content on the URLs Proposal to change wholly owned and controlled to ownership interest I have added language to reflect that subsidiaries can include over ownership interest instead of whollyowned but that is as far as we can go on this provision The reason for this is that we need to ensure that Enron exercises effective control over the URL I understand Enron had a question on the Per User Royalty for the News Order Form regarding the accesses The million in base fees covers users The accesses is based on users each accessing every business day of the month approx days I will contact Mark Taylor regarding other legal issues on the Terms Conditions See attached file EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm docSee attached file EnronInvestorDataOrderForm doc Regards Stanford Lin Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm doc EnronInvestorDataOrderForm doc

EnronOnlinecomREVISED TERMS CONDITIONS Cc a revised Terms Conditions incorporating changes discussed with Mark Taylor today I note one change which was not discussed but has been made is the global change from Subscribers to users of Distributors Internet Service The term Subscribers was not defined in the agreement and I think it makes sense to simply refer to them throughout as users There is one open issue on the Term Conditions which relates to whether the contracting entity should be Enron Corp or Enron Corp its Affiliates I will take this suggestion under consideration and hope to respond shortly See attached file EnronInvestorTC doc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorTC doc

EnronOnlinecomREVISED DOCUMENTS Cc Working Group Attached are revised Order Forms and a revised Terms Conditions Please note the following changes References to Enron Corporation have been changed to Enron Corp A termination right for the data portion of the transaction has been inserted in the Order Form for data References to Distributors Subsidiaries have been added in the license grant in Section of the TC as well as in the indemnification section in Section to extend the indemnification protection by Reuters to Distributors Subsidiaries Because of the wider scope of the license a Section has been added to make clear that if any of Distributors Subdiairies breach the Agreement Reuters will look to Enron Corp rather than the individual subsidiary The reason for this is that although Reuters acknowledges that Enrons subsidiaries may be involved in operating the URLs Reuters does not want to be put in a situation in which it has to search for the relevant subsidiary to remedy the breach Mark I hope the added language addresses your concern regarding the protection of Enrons Affiliates and the ability of Affiliates to participate in the operation of URLs Please call to discuss if necessary See attached file EnronInvestorTC reviseddocSee attached file EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm reviseddocSee attached file EnronInvestorDataOrderForm reviseddoc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorTC reviseddoc EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm reviseddoc EnronInvestorDataOrderForm reviseddoc

EnronOnlinecomREVISED TERMS CONDITIONS Cc a revised Terms Conditions incorporating changes discussed with Mark Taylor today I note one change which was not discussed but has been made is the global change from Subscribers to users of Distributors Internet Service The term Subscribers was not defined in the agreement and I think it makes sense to simply refer to them throughout as users There is one open issue on the Term Conditions which relates to whether the contracting entity should be Enron Corp or Enron Corp its Affiliates I will take this suggestion under consideration and hope to respond shortly See attached file EnronInvestorTC doc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorTC doc

EnronOnlinecomREVISED DOCUMENTS Cc Working Group Attached are revised Order Forms and a revised Terms Conditions Please note the following changes References to Enron Corporation have been changed to Enron Corp A termination right for the data portion of the transaction has been inserted in the Order Form for data References to Distributors Subsidiaries have been added in the license grant in Section of the TC as well as in the indemnification section in Section to extend the indemnification protection by Reuters to Distributors Subsidiaries Because of the wider scope of the license a Section has been added to make clear that if any of Distributors Subdiairies breach the Agreement Reuters will look to Enron Corp rather than the individual subsidiary The reason for this is that although Reuters acknowledges that Enrons subsidiaries may be involved in operating the URLs Reuters does not want to be put in a situation in which it has to search for the relevant subsidiary to remedy the breach Mark I hope the added language addresses your concern regarding the protection of Enrons Affiliates and the ability of Affiliates to participate in the operation of URLs Please call to discuss if necessary See attached file EnronInvestorTC reviseddocSee attached file EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm reviseddocSee attached file EnronInvestorDataOrderForm reviseddoc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorTC reviseddoc EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm reviseddoc EnronInvestorDataOrderForm reviseddoc
